name: Duet Sterling Silver with 10kt Yellow Gold Oval Aquamarine and Diamond Accent Ring

reviews.name: Duet Sterling Silver with 10kt Yellow Gold Oval Aquamarine and Diamond Accent Ring
reviews.reviewText: just absolutely beautiful! just the perfect size, not too big not too small, very elegant and expensive looking. I am 100% pleased with this ring
reviews.title: Love it!

reviews.name: Duet Sterling Silver with 10kt Yellow Gold Oval Aquamarine and Diamond Accent Ring
reviews.reviewText: I received this ring for Christmas and wore it for two days, when the stone fell out of the setting. I returned the ring and ordered another one. After waiting 5 weeks for the new ring, using site to store, I wore the 2nd ring for 1 week only to have the stone fall out again. I never bumped or caught it on anything it just flew across the kitchen when I shook my hand. The ring is pretty but very poor quality.
reviews.title: Stone falls out, poor setting quality.

reviews.name: Duet Sterling Silver with 10kt Yellow Gold Oval Aquamarine and Diamond Accent Ring
reviews.reviewText: My boyfriend got me this ring for my birthday. I was in love with it but the day we got it back from being sized the side prong broke and the jewel fell out. I was so upset I think that it was the manafacuter defect myself. It is a beautiful ring though.
reviews.title: 20 April 2012

reviews.name: Duet Sterling Silver with 10kt Yellow Gold Oval Aquamarine and Diamond Accent Ring
reviews.reviewText: I've had this ring for almost a year I got it as a late X-mas gift from my boyfriend. It has a chip in the gem and the gems lost its shine and original color (I've cleaned so its not just dirty) which makes me think its just colored glass and not lab made like I was told by the clerk. I have a strange body make up that my body absorbs the gold off gold plated jewelry lucky for their sake it not gold plated. it also bent about 3 months after i got it. I now wish I would have gone with one of the other two rings that was my other options. I still like my ring all in all but that just might be because of the sentimental value.
reviews.title: It Was Nice At First...

reviews.name: Duet Sterling Silver with 10kt Yellow Gold Oval Aquamarine and Diamond Accent Ring
reviews.reviewText: My boyfriend got this for me for our anniversary and I love it! Aquamarine is my birthstone and the ring looks very expensive! The aquamarine has a nice color and I am very satisfied. It's the perfect size!
reviews.title: Very beautiful!
